msContents.summary: C1, 2 Is a sale of a half part of a house by Patous the younger to his daughter-in-law, Tikas.

supportDesc.support: 3 papyri ; (a) 6 x 13 cm; (b) 6.2 x 13 cm; (c) 9.3 x 13 cm

condition.ab: The papyrus is broken into 3 fragments, probably because of several vertical folds. The upper margin, about 8 cm, survives. Some restoration needs to be done on this papyrus. (MA)
